Posts.Content: Dear All, I would request your help in responding to my below query. My mother has just diagnosed with cancer and I see the report with highlighted line as 'MALIGNANT MASS LISIONS IN LEFT BREAST AS DESCRIBED / BIRADS - IV ) I am really confused on what exactly would be the next steps to ensure I take the right decision in this path.Â  Can anyone suggest me if this is very critical please.. Thanks in advance for your reply. -Srinivas
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer BIRADS-IV
